channel.title: I've just finished half-Life 1 for the first time and...
channel.description: ...I have a question. Is the dude with the green eyes (GMan I think)on the good side or is he on the bad side? ...Or is the neutral? Besides that, what can I say, best FPS in history from my point of view. Right now I'm installing the expansion packs. I hope I'll finish them ass soon as I can cuz' I wanna see Half Life 2's graphics :smiley:

item.title: I've just finished half-Life 1 for the first time and...
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
Brother Shrike:

If it’s not fpsbanana then it’s https://hl-improvement.com/

It was the guy’s website, but it might have been linked through HL Improvement.

Edit: I did find it through HL Improvement! link
IIRC they didn’t have everything in there, but they had a lot of stuff, and you could use the HD pack for the rest. (not the Steam version, it overrides any custom models, get this and if you plan on using it in Blue Shift, this.)

Read full topic

item.title: I've just finished half-Life 1 for the first time and...
item.dc:creator: Pettifogg
item.description:
GothicFighter:

But I have the Orange Box. This means I don’t have to put the mod?

Half Life 2 comes in the Orange Box, but wasn’t on the Orange Box engine (aka 2007 engine). Valve recently updated it so that it ran on that engine.

Read full topic

item.description:
The HL2 update to the Orange Box engine comes with a number of bugs, and it’s incomplete. The mod I linked fixes all that.

item.source: I've just finished half-Life 1 for the first time and...

item.title: I've just finished half-Life 1 for the first time and...
item.dc:creator: GothicFighter
item.description:
Burbinator:

As far as I know, HL2 still has bugs and incomplete HDR and shit since the update, and this mod purports to fix all of that (HL2 fully on Orange Box engine, as on the Xbox 360 version).

But I have the Orange Box. This means I don’t have to put the mod?
Also, I encounter a problem. Sometimes, the game simply freezes at “Loading”. Sometimes it happens right when I enter the game and select a save to load(it has like 4 more white squares until the bar it’s complete but it never completely loads), either when I quickload several times or when the game loads another part of the world.
Kinda annoying.

Read full topic

item.description:
Half-Life 2 SMOD
Fucking brilliant Mod for Half-life 2 (coming soon for the Episodes) that brings a Fuckton of new stuff to Half-Life 2
New Weapons
New NPCs
New events

Sure, its a bit harder than Vanilla Half-Life 2 but ,damn, its fun
EDIT
“About 7” is a Black Mesa Forums Inside joke.

item.title: I've just finished half-Life 1 for the first time and...
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
Yeah, don’t install Fakefactory’s crap. At least play HL2 Vanilla once. Fakefactory completely destroys the game, with a movie soundtrack, ugly characters, and bad gameplay changes.
Vanilla HL2 is much better, and it’s the real experience you want to play after HL1 + Expansions.

Read full topic

It has a few positives about it, but overall its just crap. HL2 is much better without it.

item.dc:creator: GothicFighter
item.description:
Sorry for the triple post.
I’ve finished Blue Shift. Really short but I guess it’s the only game in the series(untill now) which had a happy ending.
It was an awesome experience to play Half Life 1 + Expansions and as I’m writing I’m installing Half Life 2.

Edit: You were talking about a proper mod for HL2. Looks proper to me:
https://www.cinematicmod.com/cm_10.php

Read full topic
item.source: I've just finished half-Life 1 for the first time and...

item.title: I've just finished half-Life 1 for the first time and...
item.dc:creator: GothicFighter
item.description:
I’ve finished Opposing Forces(kinda short, but good) and now I’m playing Blue Shift. There’s one thing that I found funny throughout the game. “Don’t do that” actually means “Do that if you want to pass the level”. For example, right now I’m in the sewers and the sign near the elevator says: “Keep explosive material out of canal”. Of course, there was a big “Explosive” crate near he elevator and the canal was right below me. What a coincidence. In OpFor I remember that there was some kind of tube with flames coming from it if I pushed a button. And near the tube I could read “Don’t push explosives material in front of the fire whatever”… and near the tube an explosive crate.
Weird.

Read full topic
